attributes.action: Stick to the EU referendum result of Leave and carry this out.
attributes.additional_details: I have started this petition to counter balance the remain petition. If the remain vote had won, I wouldn't have been happy but I would have accepted the decision, but the remain voters don't like the result so they are calling for another referendum. This would be a waste of time and money and ignoring the majority vote. I also don't think that the House of Commons should over turn the vote, I voted and I want my vote to count!
attributes.background: We the undersigned want our vote to leave the EU to count and for it to be carried out.
